title: Dancing On Ice Sylvain Longchambon won't get celeb partner in 2020
text:
Sylvain Longchambon was partnered with actress Jane Danson on Dancing On Ice this year (Picture: Getty)

Dancing On Ice pro Sylvain Longchambon won’t have a celebrity partner when the show returns next year.

ITV has confirmed the skaters who will be taking part and Sylvain, along with Patti Quinn, will appear in ‘select group numbers’.

The 39-year-old’s Dancing On Ice journey began in 2011 when he was partnered with Hollyoaks actress Jennifer Metcalfe.

His next partner was Sugababes singer Heidi Range, however, an injury forced him to quit. He returned in 2013 to skate with Coronation Street actress Samia Ghadie, who he would go on to marry in 2016.

The French skater’s other partners were Jorgie Porter in 2014, Stephanie Waring in 2018 and Corrie’s Jane Danson earlier this year.

Last year’s Dancing On Ice winner Alexandra Schauman, who lifted the trophy with ex-Strictly Come Dancing star James Jordan, is back on the ice as a skater, as is her husband Lukasz Rozycki.

Sylvain skated with Samia Ghadie who he went on to marry in 2016 (Picture: ITV)

Sylvain with Jennifer Metcalfe in 2011 (Picture: ITV)

Alexander Demetriou and Carlotta Edwards, another husband and wife team, are also returning.

Advertisement

Advertisement

There are some new faces for 2020 too. Tom Naylor, a doctor and orthopaedic surgeon by day, will make his ice skating debut along with Disney On Ice performer Brendyn Hatfield.

Meanwhile there’s the first ever Dancing On Ice Christmas special to look forward to with the pros and celebrities to be confirmed soon.

The festive episode will feature an epic performance from judges Torvill and Dean, with some of the most memorable stars from across the series such as Ray Quinn and Jake Quickenden performing too.

Dancing On Ice has given its judging panel a makeover after Jason Gardiner quit earlier this year. Torvill and Dean and Ashley Banjo will be joined by actor and performer John Barrowman, who competed himself in 2006.

Dancing On Ice returns to ITV in 2020.

description: Dancing On Ice 2020: Sylvain Longchambon won't get celebrity partner in 2020
